channel.title: [pi] web client. help redoing paths
channel.description:
i recently made a web client from tragedy pk's client and it works but there is no loading cache% screen. the screen is whiter untill cache is done loading then u get the loin screen. and also there is no animation players and npc's are stiff and they just slide across the ground and i dont think there is gfx either. so when i attack my arms dont move and when i walk i just slide.
a friend told me it has to do with the paths i guess like c:client/anim or whatever im not sure. but if you have never seen t pks client there is no anim folder so what do i do pleas help..

item.title: [pi] web client. help redoing paths
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
